title: FamilyMemberHistory data model based on HL7 equivalent resource

resourceType.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/' This is a FamilyMemberHistory resource

meta.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Meta' The metadata about a resource. This is content in the resource that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/uri' String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

language.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_language.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

text.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Narrative' A human-readable summary of the resource conveying the essential clinical and business information for the resource.

contained.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/ResourceList' These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

extension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Extension' May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

modifierExtension.description:
Relationship. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Extension' May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions.

Modifier extensions SHALL NOT change the meaning of any elements on Resource or DomainResource (including cannot change the meaning of modifierExtension itself).

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

identifier.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Identifier' Business identifiers assigned to this family member history by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

items.description: An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

instantiatesCanonical.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/canonical' The URL pointing to a FHIR-defined protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this FamilyMemberHistory.

items.description: A URI that is a reference to a canonical URL on a FHIR resource

instantiatesUri.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/uri' The URL pointing to an externally maintained protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this FamilyMemberHistory.

items.description: String of characters used to identify a name or a resource
Base definition for all elements in a resource.

_status.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

dataAbsentReason.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

patient.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

date.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/dateTime' A date, date-time or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month).  If hours and minutes are specified, a time zone SHALL be populated. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth, date and dateTime. Seconds must be provided due to schema type constraints but may be zero-filled and may be ignored.                 Dates SHALL be valid dates.

_date.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

_name.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

_bornDate.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

_bornString.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

_deceasedBoolean.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

_deceasedDate.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

_deceasedString.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

reasonCode.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept' Describes why the family member history occurred in coded or textual form.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

reasonReference.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Reference' Indicates a Condition, Observation, AllergyIntolerance, or QuestionnaireResponse that justifies this family member history event.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

note.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Annotation' This property allows a non condition-specific note to the made about the related person. Ideally, the note would be in the condition property, but this is not always possible.

items.description: A  text note which also  contains information about who made the statement and when.

condition.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FamilyMemberHistory_Condition' The significant Conditions (or condition) that the family member had. This is a repeating section to allow a system to represent more than one condition per resource, though there is nothing stopping multiple resources - one per condition.

items.description: Significant health conditions for a person related to the patient relevant in the context of care for the patient.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be 'FamilyMemberHistory'
